Chapter.Label: Intro
Chapter.Heading: Introduction
Chapter.Section:
Purpose and goals of this package
The datastructures package for &GAP; has two main goals:
Provide abstract interfaces for commonly used datastructures
Provide good low-level implementations for these datastructures
By default the datastructures package is not automatically loaded by &GAP; when it is installed. You must load the package with LoadPackage("IO"); before its functions become available.

Overview over this manual
Chapter describes the installation of this package.

Feedback
For bug reports, feature requests and suggestions, please use our https://github.com/gap-packages/datastructures/issues.
